amendment.description: To improve the requirements relating to removal of personal information from cyber threat indicators before sharing.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2621 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 41 - 55. Record Vote Number: 285.

action.text: Amendment SA 2621 proposed by Senator Feinstein for Senator Wyden to Amendment SA 2716. (consideration: CR S7336; text as modified: CR S7336) To improve the requirements relating to removal of personal information from cyber threat indicators before sharing.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 2621 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 41 - 55. Record Vote Number: 285.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 2621 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 41 - 55. Record Vote Number: 285.
